error.permiso_necesario: You need the %s permission to perform this operation.
error.auth_cabecera_no_proporcionada: Authentication header not provided in the request.
error.auth_token_faltante: Authentication token is missing in the authorization headers.
error.auth_token_no_valido: The provided access token is invalid, please log in again.
error.socio_no_existe: The selected partner does not exist.
error.crear_usuario: An error occurred while creating the user. %s
error.eliminar_usuario: An error occurred while deleting the user. %s
error.body_vacio_usuario_actualizar: The body is empty, so the user cannot be updated.
error.actualizar_usuario: An error occurred while updating the user. %s
error.email_no_existe: No user found with the email: %s.
error.email_password_no_coinciden: The email and password entered do not match.
error.fallo_servidor: An unexpected server error occurred. Please try again later.
